enum: Policy instruments: Economic and fiscal instruments (taxes and tax incentives, grants, preferential loans, etc.)
Policy instruments: Macro policies (e.g. national strategies/action plans, new institutions/entities)
Policy instruments: Regulatory and legal instruments (e.g. laws, standards, enforcement measures)
Policy instruments: Voluntary and self-regulation schemes (e.g. sectoral partnerships, codes of conduct, CSR initiatives)

title: Number of countries developing, adopting or implementing policy instruments aimed at supporting the shift to sustainable consumption and production
